item.title: 99 max stat 185 max combat?.. help plz
item.dc:creator: @nike20 nike20
item.description:
@nike20 wrote:

i did this : [code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 198.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 99;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 198.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

how do i change it so the max lvl is 99 and max combat lvl is 126? help plz ty

Read full topic
